description: Detects execution of wab.exe (Windows Contacts) from non default locations as seen with bumblebee activity
name: Wab Execution From Non Default Location
query: (process.executable.text:*\\wab.exe AND (NOT (process.executable.text:(C\:\\Windows\\WinSxS\\* OR C\:\\Program\ Files\\Windows\ Mail\\* OR C\:\\Program\ Files\ \(x86\)\\Windows\ Mail\\*))))
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali
